headline: BofA double-downgrades Consolidated Edison on regulatory headwinds, shares slip
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America has double-downgraded Consolidated Edison Inc (NYSE:ED) to Underperform from Buy, citing a tougher regulatory backdrop and heightened affordability pressures in New York.
